document_data.name: Foesight
document_data.mainbody: '''''Foesight''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] from the [[divination sphere]] that alterted the caster to the presence of enemies.
document_data.Effects:
This spell informed the caster when enemies approached and their approximate numbers. The spell's [[magic]] extended outward from the caster for several miles depening on their skill.

The reverse of this spell, ''[[hidden hatred]]'', was centered on the caster and masked their approach to an enemy until they were within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of them.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the caster's [[holy symbol]] to cast.
